mapper.select: SELECT QNA_IDX, Q_IDX, Q_TITLE, Q_SUB, Q_DATE, A_IDX, A_SUB, A_DATE, QNA_PRIV, PRIV_PW, IS_ANSWERED FROM QNA_TABLE WHERE QNA_IDX = #{qnaIdx}
mapper.update: UPDATE QNA_TABLE SET A_IDX = #{aIdx}, A_SUB = #{aSub}, A_DATE = SYSDATE, IS_ANSWERED = 'Y' WHERE QNA_IDX = #{qnaIdx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QNA_TABLE (QNA_IDX, Q_IDX, Q_TITLE, Q_SUB, Q_DATE, QNA_PRIV, PRIV_PW) VALUES (Qna_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{qIdx}, #{qTitle}, #{qSub}, SYSDATE, #{qnaPriv}, #{privPw})
mapper.update: UPDATE QNA_TABLE SET Q_IDX = #{qIdx}, Q_TITLE = #{qTitle}, Q_SUB = #{qSub}, Q_DATE = #{qDate}, QNA_PRIV = #{qnaPriv}, PRIV_PW = #{privPw} WHERE QNA_IDX = #{qnaIdx}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM QNA_TABLE WHERE CONTAINS(Q_TITLE, #{query}) > 0 OR CONTAINS(Q_SUB, #{query}) > 0
